Reviews.Title: Great Camera...Not so great Accessories
Reviews.Author: Patrick J Rider
Reviews.Content: The Coolpix P520 camera is great for a point & shoot camera.  It has plenty of picture settings to satisfy most non-SLR camera users.  Comfortable in the hand and not nearly as heavy as I had expected.  Some have reviewed it saying it felt cheap but I find its construction to be solid.  I love the color (Red) and would not change it but the glossy finish is definitely a fingerprint magnet.  All said, the camera is a good value and I would recommend it to anyone looking to score some quality photos.The accessories that come with this kit are pretty much a good value as well with one exception.  The case that is included with the kit is a waste of good material.  First of all, it's to small for even the camera to fit properly let alone any of the accessories.  And the first time I tried to open the top, one of the two zippers jammed and ultimately broke.  Good thing the were two zippers on it.  The remaining items in this kit are of good value.On a side note...if you are looking for a good camera case then try the Think Tank Sub Urban Disguise 30 Shoulder Bag.  It looks great, has plenty of room for your camera and loads of cool nooks and crannies all over the bag for all of the accessories.  It even has a place for your tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera Package...
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Buergler
Reviews.Content: Great camera. High end 'point and shoot' camera. I bought it for the wifi capabilities, have not used that part of it yet because the wifi plug has been backordered. It would have been nice to have that or the wifi SD card included in the package. That being said, it was a nice package deal with the extra SD card, extra battery & charger, all the items that I would have needed to purchase additional for the camera. The pic quality is awesome. With the 18mg all the pic's keep their clarity even when zoomed for editing! The 42x optical zoom is amazing outdoors! Indoors if I go the full 42x zoom, I can't seem to get it to focus, but that may be me, I'm still learning the camera. So far I am loving this camera. I did not want an SLR but I wanted SLR quality, this camera seems to fit the bill for me...Oh, and LOVE the dark red color!! LoL...

Reviews.Title: Nikon p520 digital red w/ accessories
Reviews.Author: Eva
Reviews.Content: I was blown away by how amazing this camera is and very impressed by the high quality of all the included accessories. I will definitely be recommending this company to anyone looking to buy a camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Shutterbug
Reviews.Content: Wonderful cameraEnjoyed using it in Africa.  Zoom lens great for long distance small animals and birds shots. Worked extremely well on close up flowers and plants. night scene setting was fun to work with on July 4th fire works.

Reviews.Title: Amazing zoom!
Reviews.Author: Miriam Thomas
Reviews.Content: This camera is user friendly and the zoom is awesome and amazing.  Action shots with horses, dogs, hummingbirds and butterflies are beautiful!  Very happy I made the investment!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mikhail De Long
Reviews.Content: Awesome Camera for the price.  Best deal out there.  Cannot go wrong with this product. Nikon rules.  No need for additional lenses.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bonney Armstrong
Reviews.Content: My spouse adores the new camera. Incredibly sharp pictures with the telephoto lens... every accessory you can think of. Took the deal to Costco for the same camera and they wouldn't match it. Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sebastián Campos
Reviews.Content: Perfect and excellent article. I will use them with my new Halcyon 1500 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement EN-EL5 Battery. Very useful to have everytime battery charged.

Reviews.Title: Tripod should be better
Reviews.Author: Maria Clara B. Brandao "Maria Brandao"
Reviews.Content: Purse's not so good. Tripod is bad, too fragile and legs don't slide easylly. Rest of the bundle is awsome. Yes,I recomend.

Reviews.Title: Smile � you'll love this camera
Reviews.Author: Miriam Jean-Charles
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, it takes great pics. Not too complicated. I can take quality pics. Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Kristy
Reviews.Content: I might have paid a little to much for it but all my expectations were met. Easy to use and quick to reset for the next shot.

Reviews.Title: Love the zoom.
Reviews.Author: Paul J Sabrack
Reviews.Content: This camera is a HUGE improvement over our 6 year-old Canon.  The zoom is incredible, and allows us to take great photos of things we would have just skipped before.Went to the Grand Canyon yesterday (that's really why we bought the camera) and we're very pleased.All the stuff we got with the camera, (extra battery, cleaning kit, tripod, etc) were a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Everything as planned and product is working perfectly
Reviews.Author: Carlos Pereira
Reviews.Content: Awesome store and product. The accessories are very good (not junk ones), and the camera zoom is fantastic, but will require the tripod

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: MsCurlyT
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera. Was bought as a gift for Christmas. Arrived right on schedule. Friends daughter was so happy. Thank you

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: art
Reviews.Content: very good camera with a lot of features, would suggest to a friend, great package deal well worth it !!

Reviews.Title: just love my new P520 and enjoy the way it works
Reviews.Author: SUSANN  MILLER
Reviews.Content: Is better than I hoped for eazie  to use and takes great pic's have used it sence Chrstmas taken about  100 pic

Reviews.Title: all ok, except for one thing!
Reviews.Author: james jacobs
Reviews.Content: It came pretty fast, everything was in the box as promised. Very nice camera. One problem, the camera bag could be a bit bigger in order to fit all the accessories it came with in the bag. Or at least attach a few other Velcro bags that slip on the camera strap to hold the other accessories. Other wise nice package.

Reviews.Title: Great Pics
Reviews.Author: TN Camper "Spoony"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it all that much yet, but the zoom is awesome and that's what I bought it for.  I'll know more when I get back from Alaska.  The accessories are great too.

Reviews.Title: Works Like a Charm!
Reviews.Author: Sarantoulis
Reviews.Content: This product was brought for a friend of mine, as I highly recommended it. Friend loves it!!! Outstanding product from Nikon!!

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my cousin
Reviews.Author: Sudarshan Belose
Reviews.Content: She loved it as a gift. The description says that the bundle includes 50" tripod but instead they gave us only a table top tripod stand, very disappointing. The camera is nice though, clicked many high res pictures for printing and they came out good.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Wainright
Reviews.Content: It is the best bridge camera I have ever owned.  Simple to use and takes great shots.  The bundle was great except the ridiculous tripod (they should keep that) but the extra battery is essential for photo excursions.  The zoom is amazing.  Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: An excellent camera
Reviews.Author: W B
Reviews.Content: Nikon is an great camera for what I like to get pictures of when on vacation and out and about. It's a good package except for the camera case, Camera great, extra battery and charger

Reviews.Title: Everything perfect
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and it arrived with all the described accessories. I just thought it had the hand grip strap included with the camera but it didn't.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: claudio lima
Reviews.Content: This câmera isso excellent.very easy for use.light.zoom 42 x.full HD.memory Card 32 gb and class 10.this câmera isso the best

Reviews.Title: Love the camera!
Reviews.Author: jcspx
Reviews.Content: Takes great pics!  Love most of the items in the bundle, except the tripod is more flimsy than I expected. But getting the 32mp card & the other items makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: Zoom lens great for hummingbird pictures
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Britton
Reviews.Content: The first weekend I had the camera I took some pictures from our house of a hummingbird outside.  The powerful 42X lens and stabilization feature allowed me to get nice, sharp images of the hummingbird, even without using the tripod that came with the camera and other accessories.

Reviews.Title: Trip to Africa
Reviews.Author: Dave Shellenbarger
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a photo safari in Africa, and found it to be very versatile with good picture quality. Since my computer no longer has a CD drive and the manual comes only on CD, I took a little longer to understand the camera than I would have liked. Once I got past that, found it to be feature rich and satisfying to use.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Jones
Reviews.Content: I loved everything that it came with, but my only problem was thst the case when was a bit small. Other than that, it came with everything I ever will need for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: la
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, complete package, couldn't be better.  I have already used it during trips and have been totally satisfied with it's performance.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price.
Reviews.Author: Bruce "unhappy customer"
Reviews.Content: I received the camera package today. I was very pleased with it. The only comment is that the camera case is a little on the small side given everything they are including in the package. The case can only hold the camera, charger, and extra battery. It has room for more than one extra battery and SD card. There is no room for the cleaning kit, cables and extra charger. I ended up keeping my old case and using the new case for things I was not going to carry with me. I am looking forward to taking it out and trying it when the weather improves.

Reviews.Title: Great Package...
Reviews.Author: Dave McColligan
Reviews.Content: Great zoom, lots of features, and good battery life.Case could be a little bigger to fit all the accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package!!!
Reviews.Author: Sue T Boswell
Reviews.Content: I just came back from Alaska and this camera took wonderful photos.  The battery does not last as long as I had hoped and I had read this so I took 2 extra batteries and this worked for me. I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Every option you could ever want is in this package. The Quailty was above board named brand stuff all the way...

Reviews.Title: camera case
Reviews.Author: Donald Stugart
Reviews.Content: the camera is great and easy to use, even the movie feature is fun. but the case is to small and impractical.

ProductInfo.Features:

<1> Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Red) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <3> Spare EN-EL5 Battery +
<4> Battery Charger for EN-EL5 + <5> PD-C15 Camera / Camcorder Case + <6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod +
<7> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> Image Recovery Software + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Red) with 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
